text: Altererythrobacter deserti is a Gram-negative, aerobic, short-rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Altererythrobacter which has been isolated from desert soil. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Altererythrobacter deserti at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Sphingomonadales Category:Bacteria described in 2017
title: Altererythrobacter deserti
